attributes.action: Abolish/ reduce fuel tax of atleast. Currently paying 57.95p a litre in tax.
attributes.additional_details: Robbing the middle class who work for a living!
attributes.background: Abolish/ cut fuel tax until the fuel/ oil becomes lower again.

rejection.details:
We understand you’re concerned about fuel duty, however it’s not clear whether you want fuel duty to be abolished entirely or simply reduced to a particular amount.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
